wikipedia_page.main: Edward John Carlos Plunkett, 20th Baron of Dunsany (born Dublin, 10 September 1939 – died Navan, County Meath, 24 May 2011), with Irish, Brazilian and UK citizenship, was the grandson of the author Lord Dunsany, and a modern artist and landowner.  Lord Dunsany succeeded to the title in 1999 on the death of his father, Lt-Col Randal Arthur Henry Plunkett, 19th Baron of Dunsany.

response: * Edward Plunkett, 20th Baron of Dunsany, painting and sculpture

, the title is held by the eighteenth Baron's great-grandson, Randal Plunkett, 21st Baron of Dunsany, who in 2011, succeeded his father, the painter Edward Plunkett, 20th Baron of Dunsany, and first Roman Catholic holder of the title since the 12th Baron.
* Edward Plunkett, 20th Baron of Dunsany (1939–2011), painter and sculptor
* 10 September – Edward Plunkett, 20th Baron of Dunsany, artist.
